question: Kailash Joshi, who passed away recently, was the former CM of which country?
explanation: Kailash Joshi (91), the former Chief Minister of Madhya Pradesh & BJP leader, has passed away in Bhopal on 24th of November 2019. His last ritesÂ  performed at his ancestral town Hatpipalya in Dewas district. Born on 14th July 1929, Joshi was called as the \'saint of politics\'. He served as the state\'s chief minister from 1977 to 1978. He was MLA for 8 terms and also served as member of both the Rajya Sabha and the Lok Sabha.
